price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá jẹ́ afọ́jú (nípa ’Islām) nílé ayé yìí, òun ni afọ́jú ní ọ̀run. Ó sì (ti) ṣìnà jùlọ.
arabic: وَمَن كَانَ فِي هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman kāna fī hādhihi aʿmā fahuwa fī al-ākhirati aʿmā wa-aḍallu sabīlan
